markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Alabaster Eyes](/Feats.aspx?ID=4021) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Vishkanya" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=369" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 60

</column>

---

In place of the normal vishkanyan golden eyes, you were born with especially perceptive snow-white eyes. You gain [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415).

**Special** You can take this feat only at 1st level, and you can't retrain out of this feat or into this feat.
name: Alabaster Eyes
